mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artifact_tag(artifactId, tagId, artifactTagOrder) VALUE (#{artifactId}, #{tagId}, #{artifactTagOrder})
mapper.delete: delete from artifact_tag where tagId = #{tagId} and artifactId in (${artifactIds})
mapper.select: select t.* from artifact_tag a inner join tag t on a.tagId = t.id where a.artifactId = #{artifactId}
